sen.j: 上狛駅（かみこまえき）は、京都府木津川市山城町上狛北野田芝にある、西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）奈良線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Kita-Nodashiba, Kamikoma, Yamashiro-cho, Kizugawa City of Kyoto Prefecture, Kamikoma Station is a stop on the Nara Line, a West Japan Railway Company (JR-West) Line.
Kamikoma Station, located in Kita-Nodashiba, Kamikoma, Yamashiro-cho, Kizugawa City of Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Nara Line, a West Japan Railway Company (JR-West) Line.
Kamikoma Station, located in Kita-Nodashiba, Kamikoma, Yamashiro-cho, Kizugawa City in Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Nara Line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

sen.j: 駅構造
相対式2面2線のプラットホームを持つ行違い可能な地上駅で、駅本屋側ホームが1番ホーム、跨線橋を渡って反対側のホームが、2番ホームである。
sen.e: An above ground station with two platforms opposite each other, double tracked and at which trains can pass each other or pass others, Track #1 platform is the one nearer the station structure and the platform for Track #2 is the opposite one crossing a passengers' overpass.

An above-ground station with two platforms opposite each other, it is double-tracked and at which trains can pass each other or pass others; the track No. 1 platform is the one nearer the station structure and the platform for track No. 2 is the opposite one crossing a passenger overpass.

It is an above-ground station with two platforms opposite each other and double tracks and at which trains can pass each other or pass others; Platform 1 is the one nearer the station structure, and Platform 2 is the opposite one crossing a passenger overpass.

sen.j: 本来京都方面行きとなる1番線が一線スルーとなっているため、行違いを行わない場合は奈良方面行の列車も1番ホームに入線する。
sen.e: As Track #1 is originally for Kyoto bound trains and the thoroughfare, trains bound for Nara also come in on Track #1 when they do not pass each other or pass others at this station.
As track No. 1 is originally for Kyoto bound trains and the thoroughfare, trains bound for Nara also come in on track No. 1 when they don't pass each other or pass others at this station.
As Platform 1 is originally for Kyoto bound trains and the thoroughfare, trains bound for Nara also come in on Platform 1 when they don't pass each other or pass others at this station.
sen.cmt: 「No.番線」、「No.番ホーム」の表記を統一

sen.j: 奈良線の電化時に無人化されたが、現在は自動券売機が設置されており、昼前から夜間にかけてのみ窓口も営業する。
sen.e: Became unmanned when the Nara Line was electrified and automated ticket vending machines are now installed, staff available at the window but only during certain hours of the day, from before noon till evening.
sen.cmt: 券売機が単数か複数か不詳、また"昼前から夜間にかけて"は余りにも漠然としていると思います。
sen.e: It became unmanned when the Nara Line was electrified, and automated ticket vending machines are now installed; there are staff available at the window but only during certain hours of the day (from before noon till evening).

It became unmanned when the Nara Line was electrified, and automated ticket vending machines are now installed; there are staff available at the window but only during certain hours of the day (from before noon till evening).

sen.j: 自動改札機は簡易式のものが設置されている。
sen.e: Automated ticket gates of simplfied type are installed.
sen.cmt: 改札機が単数か複数か不詳。
sen.e: Automated ticket gates of the simplified type are installed.
Automated ticket gates of the simplified type are installed.

sen.j: ICOCA・Jスルー利用可能駅。
sen.e: ICOCA and J Through Cards can be used.
ICOCA and J Through cards can be used.
ICOCA and J-Thru cards can be used.

sen.j: ICOCAの相互利用対象であるPiTaPa（スルッとKANSAI協議会）も利用可能。
sen.e: PiTaPa (Surutto Kansai Association) Cards subject to mutual use with ICOCA Cards can also be used.
PiTaPa (Surutto Kansai Association) cards can be used, subject to combined use with ICOCA cards.
PiTaPa (Surutto KANSAI Association) cards can be used, subject to mutual use with ICOCA cards.

sen.j: 但しJスルーカードについては、簡易改札機による対応のため複数枚の処理不可。
sen.e: Ticket gates are of simplified type and cannot process more than one J Through Card.
sen.cmt: Jスルーカードに関する記述は事実に反する、とJR-Westは申しておりました。
sen.e: Ticket gates are of the simplified type and cannot process more than one J Through Card.
Ticket gates are of the simplified type and cannot process more than one J-Thru Card.

sen.j: 利用状況
2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約460人である。
sen.e: The number of passengers getting on at this station was approximately 460 per day in fiscal 2006.
sen.cmt: "約"は"平均"であるべきと思われたがそのままにし、"ある"は"あった"にしました。
sen.e: The number of passengers getting on at this station was approximately 460 per day in fiscal 2006.
The number of passengers boarding at this station came to approximately 460 per day in fiscal year 2006.

sen.j: （京都府統計書より）
駅周辺
木津川市役所 山城支所（旧・山城町 (京都府)役場）
sen.e: Kizugawa City Hall, Yamashiro Branch (Old Yamashiro Town Hall)
Kizugawa City Hall, Yamashiro Branch (Old Yamashiro Town Hall)
Kizugawa City Hall, Yamashiro Branch (Old Yamashiro Town Hall (Kyoto Prefecture))

sen.j: 木津川市立上狛小学校
sen.cmt: 上記(2回)の木津川は"Kizugawa"これは"Kizukawa"でよろしいのでしょうか？(Glossaryに基づく）

sen.j: 山城町郵便局
泉教寺
山城郷土資料館
城南宝池ドライビングスクール
歴史
1902年（明治35年）5月3日 - 奈良鉄道の駅として開業。
sen.e: Inaugurated on May 3, 1902 as a Nara Railway station.
It was inaugurated on May 3, 1902 as a Nara Railway station.
May 3, 1902: The station was inaugurated as a Nara Railway station.

sen.j: 1905年（明治38年）2月7日 - 合併により関西鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: Became a Kansei Railway Company station on Feb. 7, 1905 as a result of amalgamation.
It became a Kansei Railway Company station on Feb. 7, 1905 as a result of amalgamation.
February 7, 1905: The station became a Kansai Railway Company station as a result of amalgamation.

sen.j: 1907年（明治40年）10月1日 - 関西鉄道が鉄道国有法。
sen.e: Kansei Railway Company nationalized on Oct. 1, 1907 under the Railway Nationalization Act.
sen.cmt: "関西鉄道が鉄道国有化法。（ピリオド）"では？
sen.e: Kansei Railway Company was nationalized on Oct. 1, 1907 under the Railway Nationalization Act.
October 1, 1907: Kansai Railway Company was nationalized under the Railway Nationalization Act.

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）4月1日 - 国鉄分割民営化により、JR西日本の駅となる。
sen.e: Became a JR-West station on April 1, 1987 by split privatization of Japan National Railways.
It became a JR-West station on April 1, 1987 by the split privatization of Japan National Railways.
April 1, 1987: The station became a JR West station due to the split privatization of Japan National Railways.

sen.j: 隣の駅
西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）
■奈良線
■みやこ路快速・■快速

sen.j: 通過
■区間快速・■普通
sen.cmt: 表現統一・を/に変更しました。

sen.j: 棚倉駅 - 上狛駅 - 木津駅 (京都府)
sen.e: Tanakura Station - Kamikoma Staton - Kizu Station (Kyoto Prefecture)
Tanakura Station - Kamikoma Staton - Kizu Station (Kyoto Prefecture)
Tanakura Station - Kamikoma Station - Kizu Station (Kyoto Prefecture)
